metadata.name: Founder Pass
metadata.description:
Founder NFT: This is for the collector that wants to spend a bit less but participate more.

- The Season One Founder NFT includes cover art from all of our amazing Cover Artists (12 Covers). These covers can be minted on The Sundays contract (pay for gas) and each piece is an edition from an amazing visual artist with branding and episodic details on the piece. The branding will be minimal in order to pay homage to the amazing artwork.Â 

- Founders can mint (0.0069-0.03) each animation (~72 animations). Minting animations helps support our animators, and there will be prizes and contests available only to top collectors. Only Founder (and Patron) NFT holders can mint the animations (not available to the public). There will be burning and other rewards for supporting your favorite animators.

- Founders can participate in bonus drops, raffles for editions, and other contests throughout the season.

- Guaranteed allocation to future Sundays seasons (price may vary by season).
